thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 3 of 3553
thread.title: Linda

author: Linda
title: Linda
text: I have been very happy with Thriftbooks. I've found many books here, several that I didn't expect to find and couldn't find elsewhere, and for the most part prices are extremely reasonable. I love having free shipping for $20 or more purchase. The books have without fail arrived within a few days and are in good condition. I am very happy to have found this website.
